intents.name: Generate Invoice Summary
intents.description: Extract details from uploaded document and creates a structured summary of the document based on the extracted details, including a breakdown of line items .
examples: Summarize the details from the image.
Provide a summary of the document.

name: Invoice Summary
scope:
Extract structured data from the uploaded invoice document. Identify and extract the following key details:

Invoice Metadata: Invoice Number, Invoice Date, Due Date, Currency Type.

Vendor & Customer Information: Vendor Name, Vendor Address, Vendor Contact Details, Customer Name, Customer Address.

Line Items: Item Description, Quantity, Unit Price, Total Price per item, Tax Details.

Financial Summary: Subtotal, Tax Amount, Discounts, Grand Total, Payment Terms.

Additional Information: Invoice Notes, Payment Method, Any Other Relevant Data.

Return the extracted details in structured JSON format for easy parsing and further processing.

Modify such that I get the same subagent for every wquestion in uptiq
